root: ^<sp:25>Back? Back from where?? Are-are you that E-Col guy???
^<sp:25>Weird, you don't look quite the same as before. Ohhhh, I got it! You musta failed the final trial!
^<sp:25>Don't even sweat it guy, happens to the best of us! It's a tough ask, haha!
^<sp:25><p:long>...Ok. Dude. My guy. My brother. What.<p:normal> Is with.<p:normal><anim:shake> EVERYONE! BEING! CRYPTIC!?!</anim>
^<sp:25>Ah, my bad, I haven't told you my name yet!
^<sp:25>Dude, I know your name, what I'd like to know is why everyone keeps avoiding my questions.
^<sp:25>Well, the joke is...<p:normal>huh. I've forgotten. I think you'll remember!
^<sp:25>...You’re confusing and scaring me, sir. Just, just w-who are you dude?
^<sp:25>Oh, that's easy! I'm the guide of this metaphysical plane, the Glass Owl!
^<sp:25>A trove of wonders and mysteries, knowledge and secrets forged upon a lifetime, ever growing and ever changing! I’m truly humbled to be its guide.
^<sp:25>...<p:long> I want you to sit back for a second and recognize the absurdity of the things you have just told me.
^<sp:25>Can you try, PLEASE, to explain this in a way I can understand.
^<sp:25>But you can understand. Because I understand!
^<sp:25>Well, I’m you, duh! I mean, I thought that’d be obvious. The voice, the face. I mean, read my name out loud again.
^<sp:25>...Oh.<p:normal> It’s, it’s just your name, re-arranged. Huh. Wow, kind of boring, Cole.
^<sp:25>You still don’t remember? I thought that would have jogged it back into place. Hmm. Maybe he was right, something <anim:wave>is</anim> off.
^<sp:25>Well, here’s the gist of it -- you brought yourself here, but for what purpose, I’m not sure.
^<sp:25>The only things here usually are the wanderers and fragments, but to see the real deal? That’s never happened before.
^<sp:25>Uh...ok...not sure what to do with that.
^<sp:25>You’d come before this, but you seemed more sure of where you were going. I only helped you find where you wanted to go. And now, we’re back to square one.
^<sp:25>...<p:long>Ok. Can you just tell me where I went before, and get me off this 2 hour mind bending phone call?
^<sp:25>Sure. I'll make it easy, and open the memory gate right here for you! Just walk on through!
^<sp:25>Don't know what that is, but great! Nice talking to you, uh, I suppose.
^<sp:25>Same to you, me! We always did enjoy the sound of our own voice, huh?
